title: Scones with strawberry jam and clotted cream
description: Best served still warm from the oven, scones are a classic teatime treat and are so easy to make.
ingredients: 450g/1lb strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
75g/2¾oz unsalted butter, plus extra for serving
2 free-range eggs, lightly beaten plus 2 egg yolks for glazing
